title: Kojika-sensei wa Moujuu no Ori no Naka
original_name: こじか先生は猛獣の檻の中
sinopse:
Mahiro, who was once called a "girl genius" in the world of painting, returned to the countryside after a certain incident and lived like an empty shell. One day, she lost her place to live, and the now homeless Mahiro become a live-in "male" art teacher at a super-yankee school?!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
